CodeBlockMethod.Name: description
CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- DBUpgrade 모델이 사용하는 컴포넌트 -- DBUpgrade 엔티티를 클릭하면 UI를 띄워줌

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTouchReleaseEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters --------------------------------------------------------
local DBUpgradeInfo = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/DBUpgradeUI/DBUpgradeInfo") local GameStartPanel = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/GameStartUI/GameStartPanel") local GameMatchingPanel = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/GameMatchingUI/GameMatchingPanel")
if GameStartPanel.Visible == false and GameMatchingPanel.Visible == false then DBUpgradeInfo:SetVisible(true) DBUpgradeInfo:SetEnable(true) end
